units_of_interest.description: The unit of interest for this stage. These are the units that need to complete the ObjectiveStageType before the scrit event 'on_uoi_completed' is triggered. If this is empty, the units in linked_unit_types are of interest.

loc_name.description: [string]The localization id of the stage name.

on_uoi_completed.description: [string]The script event to trigger when all Units Of Interest are completed.

on_uoi_triggered.description: [string]The script event to trigger when one Units Of Interest is completed.

map_type.description: How this objective appears on the map, if it shows area of interest etc...

use_uoi_position_as_objective_position.description: [bool]If set it will set the objective position to the first found UOI.

allow_extraction.description: [bool]If the objective is in this stage, then this objective is considered completed for calling in the extraction shuttle purposes

stratagem_drop.description: Requirement for stratagem to be called in for this objective stage

stratagem_drop_from_linked_destructible.description: [bool]If set, when calculating the distance to the objective, will use the distance to the linked destructible instead of the objective marker.

max_stratagem_count.description: How many objective stratagems can be placed for this. -1 is infinite

stratagem_drop_max_distance.description: Max Distance a stratagem drop can be placed for it to be successful

track_uoi.description: [bool]If the objective is in this stage, then the first unit of interest is tracked on the map

wait_for_behavior_count_use_loc_vars.description: [bool]If set, objective stages with ObjectiveWaitForBehaviorType::ObjectiveWaitForBehaviorType_Count will use loc vars to fill in CURRENT / GOAL, using the #CURRENT / #TARGET loc vars.

wait_for_behavior_goal_count.description: If type is ObjectiveWaitForBehaviorType_Count, this is the goal count.

countdown_time.description: If type is ObjectiveStageType_Countdown, this is the countdown time.

count_step.description: [bool]If set, this step will be counted as a step.
